alert.note: Alert for Northeast Mountains (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 27 at 12:59PM PDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Bonner and east central Pend Oreille Counties through 130 PM PDT... At 1259 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 15 miles north of Newport moving southwest at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Browns Lake Campground and South Skookum Lake Campground. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
